text: Persea is a genus of 99 accepted number species of evergreen trees belonging to the laurel family, Lauraceae.André Joseph Guillaume Henri Kostermans. 1993 The best-known member of the genus is the avocado, P. americana, widely cultivated in subtropical regions for its large, edible fruit. There are more than 200 synonyms in the genus.
